article_title: Congressional Conversations: U.S. Rep. Stephen Lynch On Obamacare, Gun Control, Refugees
article_text:
Congress is back in session after the long holiday break, and on Wednesday, the Speaker Paul Ryan made good on his pledge to begin the year with a House vote on rolling back the Affordable Care Act.

Guest

Stephen Lynch, congressman representing Massachusetts’ 8th District. He tweets @RepStephenLynch.

More

WBUR: As Mass. Legislature Kicks Off New Year, A Look At Where Key Bills Stand

“After nearly two months of dormancy, life returns to the halls and chambers of the Massachusetts State House on Wednesday, as the House meets in full formal session for the first time since Nov. 18. The Senate will return for its first formal session of 2016 on Jan. 21.”

Other stories from this show:

article_metadata.description: We hear from Stephen Lynch, who represents the Massachusetts' 8th District in Congress.
